analysis.key_quote: The reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and grant review would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and harm our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the politicization of the NIH and its impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which directly opposes the proposed rule.
